description: This is the website for instagrammer to post photos from computer.
short_description: The website to post photos to instagram
get_started: You can post a photo with a comment.
You cannot edit a photo in this website.
Uploading a video is not supported.
attention: Use your username and password to upload.
To protect your account, this website doesn't save anything.
login_failed: You failed to login. Please retry.
